name: api_rendering_Mesh
description: A class that allows you to create or modify meshes.

properties.name: bindposeCount
properties.description: The number of bind poses in the Mesh.

properties.name: bindposes
properties.description: The bind poses. The bind pose at each index refers to the bone with the same index.

properties.name: blendShapeCount
properties.description: Returns BlendShape count on this mesh.

properties.name: boneWeights
properties.description: The BoneWeight for each vertex in the Mesh, which represents 4 bones per vertex.

properties.name: bounds
properties.description: The bounding volume of the mesh that contain all vertices of the mesh.

properties.name: colors
properties.description: Vertex colors of the Mesh.

properties.name: colors32
properties.description: Vertex colors of the Mesh.

properties.name: indexBufferTarget
properties.description: The intended target usage of the Mesh GPU index buffer.

properties.name: indexFormat
properties.description: Format of the mesh index buffer data.

properties.name: isReadable
properties.description: Returns true if the Mesh is read/write enabled, or false if it is not.

properties.name: lodCount
properties.description: The number of LOD levels in this mesh.

properties.name: lodSelectionCurve
properties.description: This struct represents the parameters that Unity uses to calculate which Mesh LOD level to select. It contains the lodBias and lodSlope properties, which scale logarithmically using screen space pixel area.

properties.name: normals
properties.description: An array of vectors that defines the surface orientation at each vertex of the mesh.

properties.name: skinWeightBufferLayout
properties.description: The dimension of data in the bone weight buffer.

properties.name: subMeshCount
properties.description: The number of sub-meshes inside the Mesh object.

properties.name: tangents
properties.description: The tangents of the Mesh.

properties.name: triangles
properties.description: An array containing all triangles in the Mesh.

properties.name: uv
properties.description: The texture coordinates (UVs) in the first channel.

properties.name: uv2
properties.description: The texture coordinates (UVs) in the second channel.

properties.name: uv3
properties.description: The texture coordinates (UVs) in the third channel.
